hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #2# major items.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #the Poacher's Saw# and #the Prescription#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Iron Boots#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Map of the Forest Temple#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Arrows (30 pieces)# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a hero ventures #beyond the wasteland# to learn #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Fire Temple#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (20 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that between the #crawl spaces in the Spirit Temple# chests contain...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #Deku Stick Capacity#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that in the castle courtyard you can see a portrait of a young Talon.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #treasure thrown by Princess Zelda# is #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Magic Meter# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #the Thieves' Hideout# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #the Biggoron Sword#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (20 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Deku Stick# and #a Shadow Temple Compass#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Bombs (5 pieces)# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Saria).text: I'm a helpful hint Gossip Stone!^See, I'm helping.
